title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Donated by Charlie Lee to help promote Litecoin and the Litecoin Foundation are 8x Ballet 2022 Litecoin Summit wallets up for grabsJust make a donation to the Litecoin Foundation using the addresses below, post your txid and which spot you would likeBTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsLTC: LPy6QnnJDbiak8ihaskqCVbHTZCLufaLifI will forward the donations once the raffle has ended since the LTC Foundation uses a dynamic checkout process and only allows for 1 hour to donate/pay before it resets16 spots... 8 winners (If a winning spot comes up again, we will keep rolling)
